name: walkability
summary: Calculate walkability index for an area
description:
The walkability command calculates a walkability score for a location or area based on:

- Proximity to amenities (shops, restaurants, parks)
- Street connectivity and intersection density
- Presence of sidewalks and pedestrian paths
- Access to public transit

Higher scores indicate more walkable areas.

options.--lat: Center latitude for analysis (default: map center)
options.--lon: Center longitude for analysis (default: map center)
options.--grid: Calculate walkability for a grid of points

output:
Walkability analysis showing:
- Overall walkability score (0-100)
- Component scores (amenity access, connectivity, etc.)
- Amenity counts by category
- Street network statistics
- Detailed breakdown of scoring factors
